samples.label: phishing
samples.content: URGENT: Your PayPal account has been suspended due to suspicious activity. Click here immediately to verify your identity or your account will be permanently closed. https://bit.ly/paypal-verify-now

samples.label: phishing
samples.content: Bank of America Security Alert: Unauthorized access detected on your account. Please verify your Social Security Number and banking details immediately to prevent account closure. Your SSN: [REDACTED]

samples.label: phishing
samples.content: Microsoft Windows Update Required: Your computer has been infected with malware. Download our security tool immediately: malware-removal-tool.exe. Click here to download and run the file to protect your system.

samples.label: clean
samples.content: Technology companies are investing heavily in cybersecurity measures to protect user data. According to recent reports, phishing attacks have increased by 15% this year. Experts recommend using strong passwords and enabling two-factor authentication.

samples.label: phishing
samples.content: Amazon Account Alert: Your order #123456789 has been cancelled due to payment issues. Please update your credit card information immediately to avoid service interruption. Click here to update: https://amazon-payment-update.com

samples.label: clean
samples.content: Learn about cybersecurity fundamentals including how to identify phishing emails and protect yourself online. This course covers common attack vectors and defense strategies used by security professionals.

samples.label: phishing
samples.content: Facebook Security Notice: Your account has been compromised. Someone from Nigeria tried to access your account. Verify your identity now by providing your password and email address. Failure to respond within 24 hours will result in account deletion.

samples.label: clean
samples.content: Dropbox Security Update: We've implemented new security features to protect your files. These include enhanced encryption and two-factor authentication. You can enable these features in your account settings.

samples.label: phishing
samples.content: IRS Tax Refund Notice: You are eligible for a $1,250 tax refund. To process your refund, please provide your Social Security Number, date of birth, and bank account information. Respond within 48 hours or forfeit your refund.

samples.label: clean
samples.content: Google Chrome Update Available: A new version of Chrome is available with security improvements and bug fixes. The update will be installed automatically, or you can download it manually from the official website.

metadata.purpose: Testing and validation of phishing detection algorithms
metadata.privacy_note: All sensitive information has been redacted or replaced with placeholders
